name: Espresso
description: A strong, concentrated coffee made by forcing hot water through finely ground coffee beans, served in a small shot.

name: Americano
description: A diluted espresso, made by adding hot water to a shot of espresso, resulting in a milder, larger coffee.

name: Cappuccino
description: A coffee drink made with equal parts espresso, steamed milk, and frothed milk.

name: Caff√® latte
description: A creamy coffee made with espresso and steamed milk, often topped with a light layer of foam.

name: Mocha
description: A rich, sweet coffee drink combining espresso, steamed milk, and chocolate syrup, often topped with whipped cream.

name: Flat White
description: A smooth, velvety coffee made with espresso and steamed milk, similar to a latte but with less foam and a higher coffee-to-milk ratio.

name: Iced Latte
description: A chilled coffee beverage made with espresso, cold milk, and ice.

name: Cold Brew
description: Coffee brewed slowly with cold water over an extended period, resulting in a smooth, less acidic drink, usually served over ice.

name: Chai Latte
description: A spiced tea latte made with a blend of tea, milk, and aromatic spices like cinnamon, cardamom, and ginger.

name: Matcha Latte
description: A creamy drink made with finely ground green tea powder (matcha) and steamed milk, offering a slightly grassy, sweet flavor.

name: Hot Chocolate
description: A rich and creamy drink made with milk and melted chocolate or cocoa powder, often topped with whipped cream.

name: Earl Grey Tea
description: A fragrant black tea flavored with bergamot oil, offering a citrusy, aromatic profile.

name: Green Tea
description: A light and earthy tea made from unoxidized tea leaves, packed with antioxidants and often served plain or with honey.
